Cassie’s Spotify.question: Cassie’s Spotify:
Cassie’s Spotify.description: Alright, alright, DJ CASSIE CAS with the aux cord, trying to get something popping with 4 banging tracks.  What we listening to, fam?  Say your piece, now.

Dom’s Decision.question: Dom’s Decision:
Dom’s Decision.description: What to do, what to do…Your boy, Dom, has got a dilemma on his hands – sit with T-Money Tarquin, or with his A ones from day ones, Jayda and Mia.
options: 1. Are you kidding me, it’s gotta be with his mates, Mia and Jayda.
2. Nah, for real for real, T-Money’s got bars, so of course we’re sitting with him.
